tweet.text: Reagan recalled “Russian poetess, Irina Ratushinskaya... when in prison, she had smuggled out to him a letter signed by 10 people on a tiny piece of paper. He was still astounded that they were able to write so much on such a small piece of paper.” https://t.co/xS4IT9CAOD #FRUS
tweet.html: Reagan recalled “Russian poetess, Irina Ratushinskaya... when in prison, she had smuggled out to him a letter signed by 10 people on a tiny piece of paper. He was still astounded that they were able to write so much on such a small piece of paper.” buff.ly/2IVg7Kl #FRUS
